Constructor Detail

GameStatistics

public GameStatistics()
               throws IOException
Constructor for objects of class GameStatistics

Throws:
IOException
Method Detail

loadStats

public void loadStats()
               throws IOException
Loads the game won and lost values from the stats text file. If no file exists it is created and the values for games won and games lost are initialized to zero. The zero values are not written to the new file automatically.

Throws:
IOException

saveStats

public void saveStats()
               throws IOException
Saves the game won and lost values to the stats text file. This overwrites the previous file contents.

Throws:
IOException

resetStats

public void resetStats()
                throws IOException
Assigns the total for games won and lost to zero. Updates the stats text file to reflect these changes.

Throws:
IOException

increaseWon

public void increaseWon()
Increases the number of games won

increaseLost

public void increaseLost()
Increases the number of games lost
